description.narrative: The project development objective is to remediate and create a public space at the JiuDa mining site in Huainan city.

condition.narrative: Finance Agreement :Section I.C.7 of the Schedule to the PA: SSA Master Plan & Implementation Plan | Description :The ProjectImplementing Entity shall: (a) ensure that the SSA Master Plan 2020 is strictly observed and duly enforced throughout Projectimplementation; (b) develop, by no later than December 31, 2017, the SSA Implementation Plan under Part C.1(c) of the Project,under terms acceptable to the Bank; and (c) once completed, implement the SSA Implementation Plan in accordance with its terms. |Frequency :CONTINUOUS

Finance Agreement: Section I-C 1(c) of Schedule to the PA: Whenever required in terms of the RFP, proceed to have an additional RAPor RAPs: (i) prepared in form and substance satisfactory to the Bank; (ii) except as other agreed with the Bank, submitted to theBank for review and approval; (iii) thereafter, adopted and publicly disclosed; and (iv) thereafter, to implement, or cause to beimplemented, such additional RAP or RAPs in accordance with their terms and in a manner acceptable to the Bank.

title.narrative: IRI 2.2.1 Number of women employed through site utilization activities
IRI 3.1.1 Number of women trained at the skills training institutions
IRI 2.3.1 Number of Women visitors to public space created
IRI 2.4 Total areas of tourist service center constructed
IRI 1.5 Length of green paths constructed
IRI 2.6 Number of Irrigation Pumping Stations Constructed
IRI 2.5 Number of Curbside Service Stations with Public Toilets Constructed
IRI 1.1 Land area remediated with improved vegetation coverage
IRI 1.3 Leachate collected and treated for safe disposal annually
KPI #4 Public space created (public park, tourist/exhibition centers and associated entertainment/ recreational facilities)
IRI 2.2 Number of people employed through site utilization activities
IRI 3.1 Number of people trained at the skills training institutions
KPI #3 Satisfaction of users of public space created under the project
IRI 2.3 Number of visitors to public space created
IRI 1.6 Length of the flood discharge canals rehabilitated
IRI 1.4 Area protected against 1/30 year floods
KPI #1 Dump sites closed under the project
IRI 1.2 Vegetation cover of the remediated areas (Percentage)
KPI #2 Improved water quality in the remediated area (water quality grade)
IRI 3.3 Project site management entity established and operational
IRI 3.2 Technical Guidelines for mining subsidence area rehabilitation & redevelopment

actual.value: final report submitted and disclosed on the government website; workshops held on Nov 30, 2021
